description:
Thank you for your emails and comments and don't hesitate to write me with suggestions. I'll be glad to help all of you.

-- Plese let me know if this suits your needs.
************************************
Update 1.0.4: Word of the day functionality.
************************************
Update 1.0.3: Better UI
************************************
Update 1.0.2: Added support for the back gesture, modified the transparency of the background as per user request. Thanks
************************************
Update 1.0.1. Added search history.
************************************
This is the virtual dictionary you've been waiting for. Featuring pronunciation, great definitions, thesaurus, auto-complete and favorites, word of the day and search history, this application searches in the best database out there. Just open it and start typing. Note:This dictionary uses an internet connection to fetch the data it needs.
